PatientDetails.Name: Joanna Sprague
HospitalCourse: Admitted for NSTEMI complicated by cardiogenic shock on 09/19/2024.
Underwent emergent percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) on 09/19/2024.
Placement of Impella device on 09/21/2024, removed on 09/27/2024.
Intubated and on mechanical ventilation throughout hospital stay with assisted ventilation.

ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Discharged on 10/05/2024, clinical condition stabilized but prognosis remains guarded.

InfectionIndicators.UnexplainedHypoxia: Desaturation noted during positioning for MRI

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Fever and leukocytosis raised concern for sepsis but no organism identified.

BloodProducts.HemoglobinLevels: Hemoglobin noted at 7.4 on 10/03/2024, requiring transfusion.
BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: One unit of packed red blood cells transfused to maintain hemoglobin above 8.
